pr_title: Better log when rolled back by someone else

timeline.bodyText: This will break logging again: LeasedLockToken is not loggable by our logging infra. So either get rid of the args in this logline or figure out how to collect the stuff you need in a way that's loggable.
timeline.author: jkozlowski

replies.bodyText: For this to be useful, probably startTimestamp would be pretty useful as an arg? But then again should probably be collectable by traceId
replies.author: jkozlowski

timeline.bodyText: @gmaretic would you be able to quickly test manually using an internal product to see that this logline works?
timeline.author: jkozlowski

timeline.message: More unwrapping, tested using ETE tests

timeline.bodyText: At this point maybe we should just add something to the LockToken interface that is going to return a String that can be used for logging? Or maybe an Arg straight away? https://github.com/palantir/safe-logging/blob/develop/safe-logging/src/main/java/com/palantir/logsafe/SafeArg.java
timeline.author: jkozlowski

timeline.message: Merge branch 'develop' of github.com:palantir/atlasdb into fix/rollback-log
Merge branch 'develop' of github.com:palantir/atlasdb into fix/rollback-log

timeline.bodyText: These publics are not necessary anymore?
timeline.author: jkozlowski

timeline.bodyText: We should say we still have our locks, otherwise it's not clear what the args are meant to mean.
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

timeline.message: Improve message, make LTS package private again
